title: Disposal of an allotment of land for the College of General Practitioners of 	Sri Lanka
decision_details: - The College of General Practitioners of Sri Lanka has been established in terms of the provisions of the Act, No.26 of 1974 in order to promote the education of medical practitioner in Sri Lanka. A request has been made to allocate a plot of land to establish and maintain a new office complex for the said College. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Tourism and Lands to transfer an allotment of land in extent of 21.30 perches located at the Thimbirigasyaya Divisional Secretariat Division, belonging to the Government to the College of General Practitioners of Sri Lanka, by way of a free grant, was approved by the Cabinet.
